# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, we're confident it's worth more than what others are willing to pay. Considering its worth to you is $120, we're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $110. This is an excellent opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a reasonable cost. We look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $110. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $110
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
